court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM
outcome: Learned counsel appearing for the petitioners seeks permission to withdraw this petition with liberty to file another petition if it become necessary. Permission granted
full_text: Elie | | Ct ae IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2019/KER/S2 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW THURSDAY ,THE O3RD DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 13TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 8939 of 2018 IN cc 1042/2017 of ADDL.CHIEF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE, ERNAKULAM CRIME NO. 804/2016 OF Ernakulam North Police Station , Ernakulam PETITIONER/ACCUSED :- 1 JAMES JOHN AGED 70 YEARS S/O. PAILY YOHANNAN , MANJUMMELRKUDIYIL HOUSE, SOUTH KOTTAPADI, KOTHAMANGALAM TALUK, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT. 2 BASIL JAMES, AGED 41 YEARS S/O. JAMES JOHN, MANJUMMELKUDIYIL HOUSE, SOUTH KOTTAPADI, KOTHAMANGALAM TALUK, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT. BY ADVS. SRI .R.SREEHART SRI.SACHIN VYAS RESPONDENTS/STATE & COMPLAINANT :- 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM THROUGH THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, ERNAKULAM TOWN NORTH POLICE STATION, COCHIN- 682018 2 SHIRASTADAR, FAMILY COURT ERNAKULAM, COURT COMPLEX, ERNAKULAM , COCHIN-682011. SRI ALEX M THOMBRA- PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 03.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Be Crl.MC.No. 8939 of 2018 201KER/TS2 2 ORDER Learned counsel appearing for the petitioners seeks permission to withdraw this petition with liberty to file another petition if it become necessary. Permission granted. Accordingly, this Crl.M.C is dismissed as withdrawn reserving liberty with the petitioners to file another petition if it becomes necessary. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE SMA
